== Installfest ==

Let's get together to do some installations of Ubuntu 

* all skill levels from complete novice to expert are welcome. 
* newer users can bring their computers along - experienced users are able to help with getting started, troubleshooting problems, etc.  
* It's an advocacy and community-building event
